discourse_list.title: Where can I find market data regarding DAI and MKR?

content.content: I’m hunting for stats and analytics about DAI and MKR regional and global market across all verticals. 1.a/ globally, % of circulating DAI locked in DeFi 2.b/ for each region, % of circulating DAI locked in DeFi 2.a/ globally, % of circulating DAI in CeFi projects 2.b/ for each region: market share DAI vs USDT vs USDC… 3.a/ globally, market share DAI vs USDT vs USDC… 3.b/ for each region: market share DAI vs USDT vs USDC… …and so on Why? As explained by Nadia and the Growth Core Unit in previous threads, there are many verticals in which we can be active: DeFi, CeFi, TradFi, FinTech, Gaming, NFT/DigitalArt, Blockchain Protocols, Remittance, Merchants, Payment Processors, and so on. More stats and analytics will definitely help strategize and target our audience better. Has anyone created any type of report on this topic, whether ad-hoc research posted in a thread or a comprehensive report done by a top firm?
@Real-World-Finance gives a monthly update for questions like marketshare. They are accessible on https://finance.makerdao.network/
